Package no.ntnu.idatt1005.view

Class RecipeViewBuilder

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.idatt1005.view.RecipeViewBuilder
public class RecipeViewBuilder extends Object
Class responsible for creating the content of all recipes in RecipesPane and content of a specific recipe in RecipesPane.

  • Method Details

    • getRecipesGroup

      public javafx.scene.Group getRecipesGroup()
      Method for getting the Group that is going to contain all the recipes.
      Returns:
      empty Group-object with id recipes-container

    • getRecipeVbox

      public javafx.scene.layout.VBox getRecipeVbox(String name, String defaultAmount)
      Method for creating a Vbox with the name and portion size of a recipe. Includes buttons for adding and subtracting the amount to add the purchase plan, button for adding to the purchase plan, as well as buttons for editing and viewing the recipe.
      Parameters:
      name - Title of the recipe.
      defaultAmount - Portion size of the recipe.
      Returns:
      Vbox with the name and portion size of a recipe, with buttons to process it.

    • getRecipeInstructionsPane

      public javafx.scene.Group getRecipeInstructionsPane(String name, String instructions, float defaultPortions, List<IDAmountStruct> ingredients)
      Method for getting the Group with the information to a specific recipe. Contains the name and instructions to a given recipe.
      Parameters:
      name - Title to the recipe.
      instructions - Instructions to the recipe.
      defaultPortions - portions that the recipe will create.
      ingredients - ingredients needed for the recipe.
      Returns:
      Group-object with information to a recipe.

    • getRecipeAddPane

      public javafx.scene.Group getRecipeAddPane(String name, String instructions, float defaultPortions, List<IDAmountStruct> ingredients)
      Returns a Group-object with the editable textareas for the name of the recipe, portion size, instructions and toggleable buttons for the ingredients.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of a recipe.
      instructions - Instructions to the recipe.
      defaultPortions - Portion size of the recipe.
      ingredients - ingredients that the recipe already contains.
      Returns:
      Group with editable components to a Recipe.
